data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Let them hate. Just make sure they spell your name right.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: It's not a problem, if you always win.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: I'm not about caring, I'm about winning.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: I don't play the odds, I play the man.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: When you are backed against the wall, Break the goddamn thing down.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: I am against having emotions, not against using them.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: The only time success comes before work is in dictionary.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Winners don't make excuses.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: I don't have dreams, I have goals.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Sometimes good guys gotta to bad things to make the bad guys pay.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: It's not bragging, If it is true.

data.author: Adolf Hitler
data.quote: Think Thousand times before taking a decision But -After taking decision never turn back even if you get Thousand difficulties!

data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: The Way Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.

data.author: Vince Lombardi
data.quote: It's Not Whether You Get Knocked Down, It's Whether You Get Up.

data.author: Rob Siltanen
data.quote: People Who Are Crazy Enough To Think They Can Change The World, Are The Ones Who Do.

data.author: Dr. Henry Link
data.quote: We Generate Fears While We Sit. We Overcome Them By Action.

data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Do What You Can With All You Have, Wherever You Are.

data.author: Robert H. Schuller
data.quote: Today's Accomplishments Were Yesterday's Impossibilities.

data.author: Abraham Lincoln
data.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
